column5: Has anyone ever fished the Rideua chain of lakes? Any eye's there???
Has anyone ever fished the Rideua chain of lakes? Any eye's there???

I never had much luck fishing for Walleye on these lakes (Big Rideau and Indian). They are mostly Bass and Lake trout\splake with some pike. Also good for crappie. Check out this site and it can provide more info. http://www.fish-hawk.net/
